turns.text: So well youre you you take this subject much more personally than I do I suppose

Yeah you you werent supposed to want job

Did you -

I could not do either well enou- - I couldnt put in enough overtime that was necess- or that you know things that would come up at work that would require me to stay late or to come in early or to do something on Saturdays --

Oh yeah
